Name: Among Ass
About the game: Play with 1-4 players locally as you try to get your spaceship ready for departure, but be careful as one or more of the players on the team are bad asses looking to kill everyone! Your Spaceship is broken and you need to fix it. And in the tradition of classic space horror movies, the ship will have an unfriendly life form. Your goal will be to repair the spaceship in the allotted time, otherwise it will explode and you will lose! Freatures: *Large number of game settings and the ability to add bots *Customization. Customize the color and different hats *Perk system. Before the game, you can choose a unique feature that will help you survive or, on the contrary, kill everyone *Local multiplayer up to 4 players *Ability to play through the 'Steam Remote Play' online! *Challenge Mode! 4 different challenges await you for single and co-op *Gachi Mode with altered death sounds *Ricardo Mode for FLEX gameplay
